title: Oven Baked Chicken Parmesan
ingredients: 6 boneless skinless chicken breast halves (approximately 2 pounds total)
1 packet, seasoned coating mix for baked chicken
instructions: Use the packet of baked chicken seasoning to coat the chicken breasts in accordance with the instructions on the packet.  Arrange the chicken breasts in a 9- by 13-inch baking pan and bake the chicken for 20 minutes, until the chicken is cooked through.
In the meantime, warm up the spaghetti sauce on the stove in a saucepan.

Remove the chicken for the oven after cooking, as described above, and place the baking pan on a heat resistant surface.  Spoon the warm spaghetti sauce over the chicken breasts then sprinkle the oregano and basil over the breasts.  Top the chicken with the two cheeses and return the chicken to the oven for an additional 5 minutes, or until the cheese is nicely melted.
Remarks:  Serve with cooked pasta, such as, spaghetti, fettuccine, or rigatoni.
Source:  Quick Bites, Kraft Foods, San Antonio Express News, Wednesday, February 27, 2002.
